BadgeDetail.Name: Salon Management - Manage Quality
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they can evaluate, review and improve the overall client experience. They can develop a quality improvement plan and quality management procedures to achieve and exceed industry standards.

Task.Title: Client journey
Task.Body: Upload a flow chart showing a client’s journey within the business.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a flow chart showing a client’s journey within the business.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a flow chart showing a client’s journey within the business.

Task.Title: Gold standard
Task.Body: Upload your quality plan including a client’s journey Gold Standard including complaint management procedures.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload your quality plan including a client’s journey Gold Standard including complaint management procedures.
Task.TextileBody: Upload your quality plan including a client’s journey Gold Standard including complaint management procedures.
